page.shortlink: api client api a5 viewbox getelement method

argument.name: value
argument.description: The value of the element(s) in the view box to get pointers to.

return.name: elements
return.description: An array of elements that have the passed in value.

page.description: Disable or enable individual elements in the view box. This works on both selectable (such as a list item) and non-selectable (such as a button) elements.
